selections.name: Betty Boom
selections.reason: Drawn the absolute golden gate (1) for the unique 860m start at Gatton. Trialled well leading into this and maps to lead or box seat.

selections.name: Thrill Seeker
selections.reason: Drawn gate 2 which is crucial here. Has good early speed and should be right in the firing line.

selections.name: Sure Start
selections.reason: Consistent performer who brings solid form lines. Barrier 6 is manageable if she jumps well.

selections.name: Demes Girl
selections.reason: Resuming. Has ability but might find the 860m a bit sharp compared to the top two.

danger_horse.name: Thrill Seeker
danger_horse.reason: Inside draw and speed make him a major threat in a sprint race.

selections.name: Palawa Kani
selections.reason: Absolute track specialist (2 wins from 2 starts at Gatton) and distance specialist. Loves the wet (Soft 7 stats are solid). Drawn perfectly in gate 3.

selections.name: Goodes
selections.reason: Another track specialist (2 wins from 3 starts here). Loves the soft going (2 wins from 4 starts). The main danger.

selections.name: Zoe Shark
selections.reason: Consistent mare drawn well in gate 2. Will be competitive but meets two specialists.

selections.name: Wise Choice
selections.reason: Honest performer but faces a tough task against the top two specialists.

danger_horse.name: Goodes
danger_horse.reason: Proven track and distance winner who excels on soft ground.

selections.name: Fortunas Girl
selections.reason: Coming off a solid 2nd at Kilcoy, which is a similar tight track. Form is superior to most here.

selections.name: Concador
selections.reason: Drawn the rail (1) which saves ground. Recent form is fair and maps to get a soft run.

selections.name: Prince Phoenix
selections.reason: Improving type drawn well in gate 2. Can settle closer today.

selections.name: Just A Sort
selections.reason: Drawn well in gate 3. Weak field gives her a chance to place.

danger_horse.name: Concador
danger_horse.reason: Barrier 1 advantage in a weak field.

selections.name: Howdoyouzou
selections.reason: Won maiden impressively and drawn the rail (1). Should hold the lead or box seat and prove hard to catch.

selections.name: Swift Duke
selections.reason: Solid maiden winner who looks progressive. Threat.

selections.name: Captain Bull
selections.reason: Won on debut. Unexposed and could be anything.

selections.name: Krumac
selections.reason: More experienced than some rivals. Place chance.

selections.name: Decimus
selections.reason: Drawn the rail (1) and has excellent stats on soft ground (2 wins, 2 places). Consistent performer in this grade.

selections.name: Reggae Fire
selections.reason: Coming off a good 2nd. Drawn well in gate 4 to get a nice run.

selections.name: Toba
selections.reason: Ran well for 2nd last start. Barrier 10 is tricky but has ability.

selections.name: Muchacho
selections.reason: Drawn well in gate 3. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Reggae Fire
danger_horse.reason: Solid recent form and good draw.

selections.name: Peach Galantes
selections.reason: Emergency who gains a start from Barrier 1. Placed last start and handles soft going well. Map horse.

selections.name: Thunderous
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Form is good but carries weight.

selections.name: Yeah Copy
selections.reason: Drawn well in gate 3. Consistent enough for this grade.

selections.name: State A Fact
selections.reason: Emergency runner with decent recent form (2nd last start).

selections.name: Shooting Firm
selections.reason: Won maiden well recently. Drawn gate 3 which is perfect for the 1600m start at Gatton. Progressive.

selections.name: Spirit Of Nurai
selections.reason: Last start winner. Drawn well in gate 5. Handles soft tracks.

selections.name: Propose
selections.reason: Drawn the rail (1). Will get the run of the race.

selections.name: Kindly (NZ)
selections.reason: Emergency gaining a start. Won maiden well. Gate 2 is a huge plus.
